data.message: Thank you for keeping it real!  There's no place for a fascist racist in America.  Trump supports google Steve Bannon and the alt right movement for yourselfs- if your cool with the alt right then good for you.  But if your not- then it's time to wake up & think about what's important to you.  Alt right is white nationalism- other wise known as the KKK... not sure why you would think Eminem would support KKK/ nazi movement...
